customerJourneyMap.actions: Experiences strange noises and events in their home.
customerJourneyMap.touchpoints: Word of mouth, local news, online search.
customerJourneyMap.thoughtsFeelings: "What's happening in my house? Is it a ghost?" - Scared, confused.
customerJourneyMap.painPoints: Lack of reliable information about paranormal activity.
customerJourneyMap.opportunities: Provide educational content on identifying paranormal phenomena.

customerJourneyMap.actions: Searches for local paranormal investigators. Reads reviews and testimonials.
customerJourneyMap.touchpoints: Ghostbusters website, social media, online forums.
customerJourneyMap.thoughtsFeelings: "Are these guys legit? Can they really help me?" - Hopeful, but skeptical.
customerJourneyMap.painPoints: Difficulty in choosing a trustworthy service provider.
customerJourneyMap.opportunities: Showcase testimonials and case studies to build credibility.

customerJourneyMap.actions: Calls the Ghostbusters hotline. Schedules a consultation.
customerJourneyMap.thoughtsFeelings: "I hope they can solve my problem quickly." - Anxious, but relieved to have found help.
customerJourneyMap.painPoints: Long waiting times for a consultation.

customerJourneyMap.actions: The Ghostbusters team arrives, investigates, and captures the entity.
customerJourneyMap.thoughtsFeelings: "Wow, they are so professional and efficient!" - Impressed, relieved, and grateful.
customerJourneyMap.painPoints: The process can be disruptive and noisy.
customerJourneyMap.opportunities: Clearly communicate the process and timeline to the client.

customerJourneyMap.actions: Receives a follow-up call and a certificate of paranormal clearance.
customerJourneyMap.thoughtsFeelings: "I feel so much safer now. I'll recommend them to everyone." - Happy, satisfied, and safe.
customerJourneyMap.painPoints: Lingering fears or concerns about future paranormal activity.
customerJourneyMap.opportunities: Offer preventive monitoring services for peace of mind.

buyerPersona.name: "Worried Wendy"
goals: Ensure the safety and well-being of her family.
Find a quick and effective solution to the paranormal activity in her home.
challenges: Doesn't know who to trust for paranormal investigation services.
Fears being judged or ridiculed for her beliefs.
Worries about the cost of paranormal services.
howWeHelp: We provide a professional and discreet service.
Our team of experts is highly trained and experienced.
We offer transparent pricing and flexible payment options.
buyerPersona.marketingMessage: "Your family's safety is our top priority. We provide professional, effective, and affordable paranormal containment services."
wateringHoles: Local community groups on social media

says.title: Says
items: I keep hearing strange noises at night.
I'm worried about my children's safety.
I need someone who can get rid of this thing for good.
How much is this going to cost?

thinks.title: Thinks
items: What if the ghost hurts my family?
I hope this isn't a scam.

does.title: Does
items: Asks friends and neighbors for recommendations.
Reads online reviews of paranormal investigators.
